As for what you will be in accordance with your DNA that's not an answer too many people can give, but I have an explanation as to what I believe. We are basically made up of different codes according to a mixture of biological matter that includes nucleic acids as to whom we will be. We have people in this world that do look like we do in different places! They may or may not act as you do. Even twins that are exact do not act exactly the same or even have the same fingerprints although their DNA will match! We become what we are through many different chemical reactions during the time that we are in utero. Nothing can give us a predestined future as to what we will become in later years after birth, but our environment has much to do with it also! Also, after birth it's partly up to us and our destiny that cannot be seen by anyone but God above! We are coded and that's how we are a person and not a bird or insect! Stop trying to figure it out, because you probably never will! And when you do find out why we are on this earth you will no longer be an earthly being with the ability to pass along your knowledge of why we are put on this earth because you would have passed on… You are an intelligent deep thinking person! There are many books out there that are so informative and with so many different answers, so therefore, if you read them you may come up with your own conclusion! Keep your mind open, never have just one perception about our creation or why we are who we are! This world is vast and the creation of life forms are of the same! Enjoy!!

When we are born, God sends us here with a destiny. It is difficult to know the destiny. Even an expert wise man who tells about destiny can never tell full destiny because God wants to keep some surprises. However, those interested to know the destiny, may adopt following methods. Where the result is dependent on our efforts, watch the efforts. If right efforts are being put and we are getting small successes (as per set targets), the goal for which we are working will be our most probable destiny, in 90% of the cases. 10% is left out for God’s element of surprise. Also note that 90% is in cases where very few others are involved in our getting final success. This method does not work in cases like getting a lottery, selections where we are one among 1000, getting same day airlines reservations etc. Some persons of God can tell it up to 90% certainty. But do not spend too much time in searching the person of God. You will get him/her if you are destined to meet, so why spend too much time ? Good Astrologers can tell about it with 75% certainty. Here also, do not go on meeting Astrologers, one after another to get the best predictions. Remain satisfied with one or two and as regards the predictions made by them, do not take the same as certain and hence never stop your efforts if the same are required.

Quest to know your destiny is directing your efforts in the wrong direction. Your habits, character, circumstances, efforts, friends and family determine your destiny. You can make it whatever you want it to be. All you have to be is the best version of yourself and it will all take care of itself. If you believe in destiny, you know you can't change it. If it is in your destiny, nobody can take it from you and it is not in your destiny, nothing can give it to you. I like to think that God likes to maintain the balance between good and evil in his creation, the yin and the yang or heaven and hell… Having been born in India, I subscribe to the philosophy that your actions can be in your hands but not your fate or destiny. And, that all beings are born good and pure and our deeds determine what kind of person we end up being. The physical appearance is immaterial. The most beautiful or handsome person might not be the nicest person and the “ugliest” person might be the kindest person on this earth. I believe that every being is His image or reflection and should be treated as such. This is why I think we should concentrate on being the best version of ourselves instead of focusing on the outward appearances of ourselves or of others. Believing in ‘Destiny’ shows you believe in there being a higher power that controls everything. So let's trust ‘Him’ to be just towards us and everyone else too and enjoy the ride. I like a quote from the Sikh philosophy, “I did the deeds He directed my hands to do”.

There is such a thing Destiny based on previous lives account which shapes our present life. But at the same time there is a way to get rid of bad karmic account in present life. If we believe in Inner Power residing as Spirit in each one of us, it takes care of us and charts our path such that we live with joy and peace. And in our Ego, if we dont believe, the devil forces encash on opportunity to make our life hell. For example, if someone is too clever and takes pride in being cunning, he will be fooled no matter how meticulously he plans. On the other hand, if someone is innocent and belives in God, especially in feminine aspect of God, he will be saved even in war, quake, flood. The mistakes that we do are as follows: Purchase of God: We know that earth, Sun and Moon are working for us without any money. We cannot buy life from God. Still we think, we can buy God by donating in temples, churches etc. Money is a man-made thing, not God-made thing. Divine never understands money, (neither dollar, nor INR). When we donate in the name of God, we actually insult Him and invite His wrath.Fanaticism: Many religions are nothing but orthodox fanatic principles, very much against the incarnations they claim to follow. For example, Christ said offer your another cheek to someone who slaps you! Which Christian on earth practices it? Rather they abuse Him by drinking wine in His name. He never made any wine contrary to wrong myths created. Some indulge in fasting in the name of religious practice. For example, If its my child’s birthday, I will celebrate with lavish food party. But if its a God incarnation birthday, I will fast!!!! Why? Whats the logic? If we worship God as our creator, why will He be happy to see us fasting and suffering? Isnt mankind already living in enough sufferings that He would be pleased to see us suffering further? A simple common sense which we dont use! Who will like it when we dont eat in birthday party of someone? By the way, fasting is not prescribed in any scriptures! The word actually is Upas Na उपास ना ie Don’t fast! Those who still do उपास (fast), they are given life of beggar in next birth, so that they can ‘fast’!Disregard for women: Its feminine power that runs the universe. SHE is known by different names as Divine Mother, Holy Ghost, Adishakti, Pratkriti, Devi and SHE has incarnated as Athena (Greek Goddess), Shri Sita, Shri Radha, Mother Mary, Fatima bi (daughter of Prophet Mohammad) and 108 times as Shri Durga. Most religions have ignored this feminine aspect of God and hence failed. Once we disregard feminine aspect of God and more importanly good respectable women, we invite wrath of all deities including Goddess. Indians have disregarded Shri Sitaji and its worthy women, so they suffer generally on poverty! Power of Shri Krishna is Shri Radha. Ra means Energy, Dha means Dharan (ie Sustain). If Shri Krishna alone had any powers He could have killed Kansa right after His birth!Ignoring Common Sense: God is aways fair. Schooling and formal education can be matter of man made privileges, but common sense is something that He ensured that everyone is born with. Often illterates are found to have more of it than many well read men! Kabira said, padhe padhe pandit hua moorkh (By reading too much, a wise becomes fool). It doesnt require anything to print any book. One is free to write anything and people read it as Gospel without applying common sense. This is how many so called spiritual and religious personalities have misled seekers of truth. So many false gurus have come up promising to ‘sell’ peace! If peace could be sold in shops then why there is no peace in the world when most have people have money? Do we ever use our common sesnse? We don’t, so it gives business opportunity to fake gurus like Ravi Shankar, Sadhguru, Dalai Lama and anyone having prefix and suffix Baba and Swami in his name, esp those who have come up after 1970. They have made people their slave of their sex, power and money needs by hypnotising. People blindly offer money thinking they will be able to buy Divine Love. What will God do of our money, which is a man made thing? (Which can be demonetised anyday by any Prime Minister overnight). Do we ever think ???Black Magic: It is sold everywhere and people buy it. There will hardly be anyone who believes in God or who doesnt believe in God who never bought it! How? When we know its a bad and harmful thing, why we buy it? Actually it is sold by a different name! It is sold as white magic as spirtual thing. It is sold as spiritual mantra, magic mantra, special puja to change fortunes, as stones which people wear in their fingers to change their Stars or tabiz. Strangely proud athiest like Irfan Khan used to buy it to get cancer. He clearly said in his interviews he does not believe in God, then what is that Tabiz in neck his representing? Anti-God powers!So its a vicious circle we put ourselves into. Their followers gets incurable diseases and follow Astrologers, Tarrot card readers, fortune tellers etc who basically use Black Magic techniques to impress us and get things done for their clients. To ensure, client keeps coming back to them, they put some black magic in their lives, so smartly so that one comes again to them and revenue keeps rolling in. They cause much more harm than the loss of money to their clients. They give them diseases like Cancer and many more horrible incurebale diseases for life for which medical science has no cure. And for cure if one goes to black powers like Vipassana, alternative medicines, pranic healing, Reiki etc, then he further entangles himself into that fatal vicious circle.So in nutshell, the answer lies in being alert, catious, using common sense and believing no one but God that resides in our heart as the Spirit! The thing that is sold is Satanic power!

Life is full of uncertainties. Now, what happens next isn’t confirmed, so I believe that finding something which is not confirmed or probably would be created with time and your actions is completely impossible. Now having studied various scriptures and Srimad Bhagvad Gita, I can explain a concept of how actually the destiny works. Now just leave the past and future, as they are domain of god, but now YOU are in control of the present, of course with the will of Krsna, so in whatever condition you are is your destiny currently, but the actions that you take within this period shall create your destiny for next period. Coming to your actions, it is said that you have sanskara which means something that you have inherited from your past life or experiencing certain conditions due to your karma in present or past life. Now, in this there are two stages of further formation with relate with subconscious mind, one is Rag and other is dvesha and actions are pretty much controlled by these, so your destiny somewhere is related to your previous karma, and the action you are performing right now, which matters the most. karmanya vadi karasye, maa phalheshu kadachana You only have right to action, and not entitlement to any fruit, and neither should you think about it. So your actions define the destiny continuously but there is surely an element of God and previous karma, which should not bother you. Hare Krishna!

There's a solid argument that no matter where You go there You are. Destiny is what you wake up to in the morning and what you lay your head down on your pillow at night having fulfilled. Asking about Destiny is either delving deep into acceptance of your moment, or ( far more likely) hoping for an ideal future. So to satisfy this I'll ask: do you A) pick up the tools at your feet and do with them what they are best suited to accomplish, or B) create a hole in your life that is shaped exactly like you want and try to push every experience into the far recesses to fill in the gaps? Basically are you building towards fulfillment or are you fiddling about in the empty spaces between your actual hopes and dreams? Strong spirit that I know explained it this way — “When I woke up one morning and was done bullshiting about in the woods looking for myself I wandered out of my tent buttnaked and held my hands up in the sky as the sun rose and said, ‘I am ready for everything you have in store for me and I'm willing to take responsibility for everything that that brings!’” I see him out and about on occasion and he's got a lot of years under his belt so I guess thats worked out well for him. What do you think? I by no means have the strength or clarity to take such consistent strong action, but I've met you this far.

The problem that pricks your conscience is about your future…. the uncertain future. You have fears about what will happen tomorrow. As far as DESTINY is concerned, the game, for the span of this human life, was over roughly about nine months before you were born from your mother's womb. See these lines…. “ THE MOVING FINGER OF ‘TIME’ WRITES, AND HAVING WRIT IT MOVES ON……” What did the moving finger of time write? Based upon the good and bad, the PUNYA and the PAP (the virtue and the vice)…. the sum total of past actions; based upon the sum total of the actions of your past life, the NAME OF YOUR MOTHER ( the lady from whom you were to be born in this life) WAS WRITTEN BEFORE YOUR DEATH IN THE PAST LIFE. This is destiny. Destiny over which you have no choice. That is why we say, a person can choose everything in this world. If he can NOT choose, it is his mother. Remember….. MOTHER is not just a lady. She personifies your limitations of this life, limitations so strong and bondage so calibrated that you have no option at all but to bow down your head and accept. So when you say…. How should I know my destiny of this life…. It is like the definition of a philosopher…..” In a dark room, looking for a BLACK CAT…. The cat, which is NOT there.” Don't bother about your destiny. Don't bother about what will happen tomorrow. Just take care of the present. Do the very best that you can. Exercise the best option. And leave the rest to God. HE will take care!!

There’s an issue that not many are considering: Destiny & Fate are basically the same thing, you cannot control it, and you will not know it til you are practically standing on the threshold. People confuse Free Will with Destiny. Free Will is what you have from the start that allows you to shape your own end, course no one really thinks about their end til they are really close to the end. Everything is up to you when Free Will is involved, but that means that Destiny & Fate cannot exist alongside Free Will. Destiny & Fate are shackles, you do everything according to a preset plan before you were even born. Free Will has no shackles, you do everything according to your will and not the design of a cosmic entity. Can we know for sure with absolute 100% certainty that we have Free Will or are shackled to Fate & Destiny? No, we cannot possibly know that. Even Prophecy contradicts Free Will, for a Prophecy to work, everything has to be pre-planned along with every person alive involved in that plan whether they know it or not.

“There is no such thing as destiny, it is by choice, not by chance” Someone asked a wise man: It is said that everyone’s destiny is determined. The wise man nodded: Yes. For those who believe in it. If they think so, they believe that the circumstances of life are inevitable, consciously submitting to them and to those who created them. But there are people who do not believe in predestination, preferring to be the predestination of others. The one who asked grunted sceptically: And how would then God know everything beforehand if there was no predestination? – And triumphantly looked at the wise man. He simply raised his hands: I don’t know about God… He did not instruct me to answer on his behalf. But if I were him, I would be extremely bored knowing everything beforehand; it would be the same as you would be playing giveaway with yourself. I would most likely come up with a game, that would entertain me endlessly, and I would never know what the next move will be

That’s easy. I can foretell your destiny - you are going to grow old, sick and then you are going to die. That’s the destiny of your body. The destiny of your self, the destiny of your soul, is to become reunited with Krishna and play with Him eternally. Krishna says: Now hear, O son of Prtha, how by practicing yoga in full consciousness of Me, with mind attached to Me, you can know Me in full, free from doubt. I shall now declare unto you in full this knowledge, both phenomenal and numinous. This being known, nothing further shall remain for you to know. Out of many thousands among men, one may endeavor for perfection, and of those who have achieved perfection, hardly one knows Me in truth. Earth, water, fire, air, ether, mind, intelligence and false ego -- all together these eight constitute My separated material energies. Besides these, O mighty-armed Arjuna, there is another, superior energy of Mine, which comprises the living entities who are exploiting the resources of this material, inferior nature. All created beings have their source in these two natures. Of all that is material and all that is spiritual in this world, know for certain that I am both the origin and the dissolution. O conqueror of wealth, there is no truth superior to Me. Everything rests upon Me, as pearls are strung on a thread. --Bhagavad Gita 7.1-7

I have never worried about my destiny, except in hindsight. My understanding of my destiny is that it’s not pre-destined, but is really under my control, and only I can control it. Does that deny God (or other higher power)? No, it really doesn’t. My faith suggests that God may provide guidance, and my religion may influence my direction - my decisions about where I choose to go - but my destiny is completely within my hands. My belief is that one should learn to regularly reflect, whether that is through meditation, prayer, or just talking to yourself. This action will allow you to learn from mistakes, understand your course in life, and find your purpose through your present actions. Is this the best course? Is the path I travel the best one for me? Where is this path likely to lead? From that point, you can set some plans and move in a more positive direction. That path will lead to your destiny. Your path - your life - will be different. Embrace that. Be an observer and student in your journey. Your destiny will reveal itself.

What? How one can realize their destiny? seems to be very interesting question my dear friend. Realization of your destiny depends on your beliefs. If you can understand your beliefs you can find your way to the life you think is your destiny. The real question is how do you find what are your beliefs? In your daily life you have hundreds of such moments when you don’t agree with your friends, family and other people around you. Some hot topics include your career, marriage and other stuff. You just want to follow the things you believe in. To do so, you have to be courageous to stand for them. and more importantly you have to act on them. Once you start living your life on your terms you will find that is your destiny. all actors, singers, writers, entrepreneurs and even the mad engineers and doctors they are part of this group. If they have followed the path they believe so you can as well. Please share your experiences with me when you finally show courage and implement on your beliefs. I will be watching you. Thank you!

How do we know our destiny? You always know two things that destiny has shown us : who born us and we are going to die. The path between two things above is unpredictable. That path of destiny is base on what we choose to do in every moment and the way that enviroment around us affect to our choice. There are unlimited numbers of the path that could be your destiny. So, if someone tell you that they know EXACTLY your destiny, they are cheater or the one back from the future. So, you shouldn't try to know your destiny, it's only simple like a collection of choice. Choose your own faith, living meaningful, make wise choice and enjoy your destiny. Good luck with your choice !

God has delegated that task to us, it is up to us to be blessed or to be cursed. The message that God has revealed to all prophets is: ‘Blessings for obedience and curses for disobedience’ All prophets taught that we can earn salvation by obedience, repentance, and good deeds to help others. “In obedience and repentance is your salvation” Isaiah 30:15 Based on the above, the obedient believer should be blessed in this life and should be saved in the afterlife. You have to learn to passionate about everything you do. Try to bring a smile in people’s lives and see how you can achieve the same. It may be a very small thing but it can make a lot of difference in other people’s lives. Try to like yourself and try to start from now. Develop interest in whatever you do. Never bother about past as it is over. Focus on the present alone and see how you can give 100% to it. Destiny is made by us and god together. So if you do good things and work very hard god will surely help you get to the next step. Instead of looking at what you are not, make up your mind and see how best you can live your life without wasting one minute. Get your priorities in place and maintain a time table and stick to it. Starting building a new life from today. Everyone has problems. There is no human life without a problem. What matters how we fight against those problems and move on. Shape your present and you will shape your future as well. Work as hard as you can and never give up.

Albert Einstein is known to have remarked “I can’t believe that God is playing with dice!” Albert Einstein is one of the greatest of minds in human history. But his intelligence was focused on physics predominantly and perhaps not as much on life in general. Our destiny is precisely like rolling a dice. You have not the faintest idea as to what number is going to show up at the top. There are a million+ variables that govern your life. The macro world is believed to be deterministic but the quantum world is not. This shows clearly that natural laws allow for randomness. In any case no human has predicted what is to come with 100% accuracy. So how do you look at destiny? Well, follow Sri Krishna’s advice. Sri Krishna says in the Bhagavad Gita that, all that you have under your control is to do your best. What the result is going to be is a great unknown. You may sow the seed, water it, put enough fertilizer and do all pest control that you need to do but will the seed sprout and produce a harvest or not is not under your control. Hope for the best and be ready to accept the worst. That is the way to be wise and happy.

why would you want to find that out; how would your life be knowing things like you will have an unpleasant dispute with someone next week [date and time very specific], that you will win $100, 10 years from now, be homeless in 11 year or details of your death, etc.] Would you want to know all this or only the ‘happy’ things? Perhaps you must have got the idea from this that if a man wishes, he can change his destiny by precise and timely measures, but the planets prevent him from doing so repeatedly. Karma can be slow and quick to come back to the person who sent it out. It can come back in this life and it can come back in a later life. But one thing is 100% certain: it WILL come back. Nobody can understand his or her fate seen in a one-life perspective. Your destiny is shaped by our own previous actions. The goal of of long journey of evolution is to become real, all-loving human beings, who live to serve others. That is the goal, so the more you practice friendship, help and universal love the closer you are to your goal.

response.answer_text: A2A - How do you determine your destiny? 1.	Know yourself. 2. 	Do what is best for your soul. 3.	Leave the rest up to God. These rules are profoundly simple, yet more difficult than you can ever imagine. Many never come to fully understand even the first one. And try though you must, how do you do what is best for your soul if you do not know yourself in the first place? Finally, leaving the rest up to God? To place yourself in God’s hand and accept His will over your own will? It would be easier to move a mountain for some people. And while these three rules are a process, they are also a simultaneous endeavor. It is not a matter of waiting to finish one to start the next. They are accomplished by hard work at all three at once and together, working in harmony.

There is this common fallacy that there is something very special that only “I” can achieve and everything else is just details. The future does not exist and so there is nothing to achieve in the future, there is only now and your purpose is to bring your full attention to bear on right now. This is a hard lesson, nothing is more or less important than another, washing dishes and saving a child's life as a surgeon, picking up dog poop and running a country, all are exactly the same. All can be meaningful and reveal the divine if we are present to it, we don't change the world with what we do, we change it through how we do.

It’s not that Narendra Modi knew his destiny is to become Prime Minister of India and joined RSS & Politics. He joined RSS at 20 & became CM of Gujarat in 2001(even then he didn’t knew his destiny). After 12 years he asked himself what next? So, you see the important step here, the important step here is figuring out your next step. Once you figure it out then the next one. You can’t know what life has for you after 10 years or 1 year or even the next month. Ask yourself what do you have now and where do you want to go next? So YOUR ALLEGIANCE TO YOUR NEXT STEP WILL HELP YOU FIGURE OUT YOUR DESTINY.

This world of humanity is based on full freedom and absence of any forcible destiny. Here, you are free to do any type of work and no destiny forces you to do any specific work as said in the Gita (Na kartrutvam...). The concept of destiny exists only in the link of the specific work and the specific fruit. You have full freedom to put your finger in fire or water. No destiny forces you to put your finger in fire or water. The destiny lies only in the link between a specific work and corresponding specific fruit. It is destined that the fire burns your finger and the water keeps your finger cool. The destiny is not in the selection of the work.  You have put your finger in the fire due to ignorance or ego. After burning the finger, you may say that you have put the finger in the fire due to the destiny. God has destined the specific system, which links every action with a specific fruit. After putting your finger, God is not ordering the fire to burn it. The subsequent fruit for a specific work is already destined. God or the destiny does not interfere with the choice of your selection of a specific work. Even the so called past destiny does not interfere with your works. The composition of your psychology is fixed based on your past deeds. Thus, work is responsible for the will and the will is the generator of the work. Since the composition of your psychology is already based on your past deeds and is fixed, you can treat that as destiny and in such case, destiny is guiding everything.  The psychology is a specific pattern of ideas generated by the past deeds and it is called as ‘Samskara’. An idea can be changed by knowledge. Samskara is a fixed concept and the right knowledge is a group of right concepts. You have the opportunity of hearing the right knowledge since God comes to this world quite often in human form. You have the freedom to hear such divine knowledge or not to hear. You have also freedom to practice the knowledge or leave it without practice. At every step, the basic freedom is given. This human world is also the right place for testing the devotees and here also, the full freedom is protected. You are totally free to sacrifice anything or not to sacrifice anything even if God desires for it. God does not force you or threaten you or wash your brain in your sacrifice since such sacrifice is not real. God is pleased only with the real sacrifice done by the soul in the atmosphere of total freedom.  In the examination hall, you are totally free to answer the question paper to any extent or even to return the white paper without writing even a word. God preaches the total concept and in the stage of implementation of it, God does not influence your mind in any way. After teaching all the right knowledge through the Gita, Krishna said that the decision to fight or not is totally left to Arjuna (yathechchasi…). The basic reason is that God is not in need of anything from anybody. The sacrifice is not to satisfy God but only to uplift you. The sacrifice proves your real attachment to God and such real attachment is not in the benefit of God but it is only in your benefit. Krishna asked for the special gem from Satrajit, the father of Satyabhama. Krishna is not in need of that gem. He is the creator of that gem. Even without the help of that gem, He can create wealth. He can even stop the power of the gem to create the wealth. Krishna asked the gem from Satrajit because Satrajit cannot maintain it and will fall in trouble.   Only for the welfare of Satrajit, He asked him for that gem. But, Satrajit thought that Krishna asked that gem for His personal benefit and thereby, for His personal satisfaction. Such misunderstanding made Satrajit to refuse the gem. Astrology says that the happening of good or bad incidents is due to the planets. This misunderstanding again leads the people to think that their actions are destined by the planets. Here, your actions are not destined by the planets. Your actions are only destined by your psychological set up, which is destined by your past deeds. The planet links the specific fruit for the specific action.   You do something based on your Samskara. The planet gives its correspondent fruit immediately. You blame the planet for guiding you to do a specific work and this is totally wrong. A planet is only destined to give the specific result linked with your specific action. The specific work is based on your specific psychological pattern only. The horoscope gives the composition of your specific psychological pattern. Since your future actions also depend on the same pattern, future prediction can be easily given. A specific psychological pattern is always linked with a specific composition of planets representing your qualities or ideas.  Therefore, there is no external destiny here other than yourself regarding your future. If the Samskara is modified with the help of the divine knowledge, the whole destiny is changed, which means your horoscope totally disappears. Every period is divided into sub periods, every sub period is again divided into further sub periods and every division involves the revolution of all the nine planets again and again. This means that human being is a mixture of both good and bad always in every step of the time.  Actually, the basic concept of astrology indicates that there is the existence of some unimaginable supernatural force that guides this world. Hence, astrology is an introduction for the philosophy. Without taking this basic reality, you misuse the astrology to justify yourself by linking your wrong actions to the planets. The worship of the supernatural and unimaginable planets introduces the worship of unimaginable God. But, this is again misused as the worship of the planet for not giving the bad result for the bad action done by you.  If you worship God, He will preach you the right knowledge, which changes the total destiny. By your worship, God will not protect you from your sins. Therefore, in this world, the destiny is also in your hands only. There is full freedom for you to change your destiny through the right knowledge. Hence, this world of humanity is called as ‘Karma Loka’, which means that your actions decide everything and that your action is based on your psychological pattern only and not by any pre-determined external destiny. The upper worlds are called as ‘Bhoga Lokas’ because there is no freedom to perform any new action and you have no freedom at all, but for enjoying the destined results for your already recorded actions.  ‘Pravrutti’ means attachment to worldly bonds. ‘Nivrutti’ is detachment of your worldly bonds for the sake of God. This world is the stage for both pravrutti and nivrutti. Full freedom up to the level of changing your destiny exists here. Your destiny is only your fixed psychological pattern generated from the past deeds and not any other external force. This pattern can be changed by the right knowledge received from God in the form of preacher. Therefore, there is every chance for changing your destiny in this world. Generally, people blame the reason for their bad actions to be some external force called as destiny in which there is no trace of their personal psychological involvement. People say, ‘People say so’. The people cannot be the authority unless the whole subject is perfectly analyzed. Even there are several misinterpretations in books written by ancestral scholars. You should not blindly take the people or the ancient books as authority without analyzing them perfectly. The Gita says that you will laugh at such authorities if you analyze the subject with sharp scientific intelligence (Buddhyaayukto…).  Even if the implementation is impossible, it is better to have the right knowledge, which follows the soul to the next birth so that the practical implementation can be done sometime in the future. This point looks quite good, but there is the practical danger. Just like the cooked food can be attacked by the bacteria in the atmosphere, the right knowledge is also attacked by the worldly attractions and sometimes, the right knowledge may become weaker and weaker and even may finally disappear even in the later part of this life. Therefore, it is better to implement the realized concept as early as possible like eating the cooked food immediately.
